Sorry, we couldn't verify your account.

Looks like that verification link was not valid.

Here are some reasons why it might not have worked:

  • The link expired: the link is valid for up to 3 days.
  • There are other verification emails sent besides this one: we only accept the latest verification email sent.
  • You changed your email after this verification email was sent.
  • It's an error on our end. Please contact support if this problem persists.
